herosection.heroTitle: Discover Your Inner Strength Through Taekwondo
herosection.heroSubtitle: Master physical skills, mental discipline, and build confidence for all ages and skill levels.

schedule.title: Weekly Class Schedule
schedule.subtitle: Choose the perfect class time for your age group
schedule.note: All classes are 60 minutes long. Please arrive 10 minutes early.

whoWeAre.title: Al-Wifaq Taekwondo Club Association
whoWeAre.subtitle: Empowering champions through discipline, respect, and excellence in martial arts training

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.description: At Al-Wifaq Taekwondo Club Association in Dakhla, we are dedicated to fostering physical fitness, mental discipline, and moral character through the ancient art of Taekwondo.
mission.details: We believe in creating a supportive environment where students of all ages can develop confidence, self-defense skills, and lifelong friendships while learning the traditional values of martial arts.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our training and shape our champions

discipline.title: Discipline
discipline.description: Building self-control, focus, and dedication through consistent training and practice

respect.title: Respect
respect.description: Honoring our instructors, fellow students, and the martial arts tradition

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Striving for continuous improvement in technique, character, and sportsmanship

perseverance.title: Perseverance
perseverance.description: Overcoming challenges and never giving up on our goals and dreams

coach.title: Meet Your Master
coach.subtitle: Learn from a world-class Taekwondo master with decades of experience and countless achievements in martial arts excellence.
coach.name: Master Kim Jong-Su
coach.description: With over 15 years of dedicated teaching and competitive experience, Master Kim brings unparalleled expertise to our academy. Having trained Olympic athletes and won numerous international championships, he combines traditional Taekwondo techniques with modern training methodologies to help students achieve their full potential.

kids_4_8.name: Kids 4-8 Years
kids_4_8.description: Fun and engaging introduction to Taekwondo for young children, focusing on basic movements, coordination, and discipline.

kids_9_11.name: Kids 9-11 Years
kids_9_11.description: Building on fundamentals with more structured training, belt progression, and character development for pre-teens.

kids_11_13.name: Kids 11-13 Years
kids_11_13.description: Advanced training for teenagers with focus on technique refinement, sparring basics, and leadership skills.

kids_6_12.name: Kids 6-12 Years
kids_6_12.description: Comprehensive program covering all aspects of Taekwondo training suitable for elementary school age children.

youth_adults.name: Youth & Adults
youth_adults.description: Complete Taekwondo training for teenagers and adults, including self-defense, fitness, and competitive preparation.

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Explore moments from our training sessions, competitions, and special events
